title: Bloomberg Markets: Harvard's Goldstein on Putting Ideas to Use

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jodi Goldstein Managing Director Harvard Innovation Labs Discussing creating experiential learning opportunities for Harvard students.
